title: Rajasi Gold Kangan: Emerald, Ruby, and Diamond Embellished Bangle
features: Openwork design with delicate floral motifs, intricately embellished with diamonds. The focal point is a lush green Emerald cabochon, surrounded by a halo of vibrant rubies and sparkling diamonds. Features a secure hinged closure for ease of wear. Traditional South Indian design elements with a modern openwork twist.
occasions: Weddings (Vivahaalu); Festive occasions (Pandugalu); Traditional ceremonies (Shubhakaryam); Anniversary celebrations; Elegant evening events
description: This Rajasi Gold Kangan is a breathtaking fusion of traditional South Indian artistry and modern design. The vibrant combination of emeralds, rubies, and diamonds against the warm backdrop of 22K gold creates a statement piece that exudes elegance and luxury. The intricate openwork design adds a contemporary flair, making it a versatile heirloom piece that can be cherished for generations. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and durability.
